#summary Key Binding

= Key Bindings =

As in GNOME, our !FileChooser supports the following key bindings:

||Control L||hide/show the location text field||
||Alt Up||go to next folder in the path bar||
||Alt Down||go to previous folder in the path bar||
||Alt Home||go to the home directory||
||Alt D||go to the desktop directory||
||Alt 1 .. 9||go to the first, second... and so on bookmark||
||Alt 0||go to the last bookmark||


See also
http://library.gnome.org/devel/gtk/2.15/GtkFileChooser.html#gtkfilechooser-key-bindings
